author: arkurth
msg: Updated install_perl_libs.pl to set the exit status of 1 if an error occurred, 2 if the user did not accept the license notification, and 0 if successful.

author: kwall
msg: * These test cases seemed to be testing features of the core model rather than anything specific to keystores/truststore.  The core model
is tested by the AbstractConfiguredObject tests.

author: kwall
msg: QPID-6292: [Java Broker Tests] Add model mechanism test testing the behaviour of secure attributes

author: arkurth
msg: Updated utils.pm::get_management_node_requests to return an empty hash reference if no requests are assigned to the management node.

Updated rename_vcld_process so that the process name contains '|<request ID>|<reservation ID>|<state>'. This matches the lines writtent to vcld.log and makes it easier to copy the string and pass it to grep.

author: jawi
msg: - The ZIP specification mandates that *only* forward slashes
to be used for separating directories. See section 4.4.17.1
